caption.p: Herbivores on the leaves of A. adenophora with and without the foliar fungus Colletotrichum sp. Col+ and Col− represent leaves with and without Colletotrichum sp. inoculation. Nonparametric Mann–Whitney U tests were used to identify differences in herbivory between Col+ and Col− leaves (+ represents p < 0.1). The error bar represents the standard error
